products.title: Genesis Blackout Grey Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their genesis blackout range comes in 6 colour variations and is the perfect choice for a modern look. This grey perfect fit roller blind is bang on trend so will look great in any room and is also made from blackout fabric so will help to keep the light out of rooms when you want to keep them dark. The perfect fit aspect of this blind means it can clip straight on to pvc window frames - saving space and meaning no drills or screws.
